fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (White) each night.
- (White): Attack a player each night.
- (White)(1): Transform yourself into a different Gatherer White role at random. You will retain your Lifelink attribute from this role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Lifelink: Whenever you kill an enemy, in the following night, your defense will increase by the difference between your attack's level and your victim's defense level.
